doc.field: C L f0816reute u f BC-slaughter-guesstimate 04-07 0063

Chicago Mercantile Exchange floor traders and commission house representatives are guesstimating today's hog slaughter at about 290,000 to 307,000 head versus 294,000 week ago and 317,000 a year ago. Cattle slaughter is guesstimated at about 124,000 to 128,000 head versus 133,000 week ago and 135,000 a year ago. Reuter
